description: This file implements platform-dependent and utility functions for a TLS Session Manager, primarily providing the creation function `TlsCreateSessionManager` which delegates to `TlsSmoCreate`. It contains licensing information, module details, and the function definition.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE TlsCreateSessionManager(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates a new TLS Session Manager object by calling `TlsSmoCreate` with provided context handles.
